    LeapSeconds.offset_tai_utc — Function.
    offset_tai_utc(jd)

    Returns the offset between International Atomic Time (TAI) and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for a given Julian Date jd. For dates after 1972-01-01, this is the number of leap seconds.

    offset_tai_utc(dt::DateTime)

    Returns the offset between International Atomic Time (TAI) and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for a given DateTime. For dates after 1972-01-01, this is the number of leap seconds.
